feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:47 p.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets ending near noon then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
